name: Dungeon Lurk II - Leona
description: A Story Driven Action Puzzle Adventure Game. Take your time and explore the environment for clues to puzzles. Zoom in to detailed areas to find secrets that allow you to progress in the game. An adventure full of mystery, obstacles, enemies, stories, battles, puzzles, fun and comedy.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Video / Shader Model 2.0 suppoort DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Poorly designed game. Not compelling. in the least. You are forced into top-down perspective. No option. The designer has a habit of grabbing the camera and dragging your eyes through their idea of what you should be doing, and it's enough to give you motion sickness.  ♥♥♥♥♥ game, poorly planned, poorly executed.
